sentence.text: On the other hand, growing tumors evade immune surveillance by exploiting co-inhibitory signaling through expression of negative regulation of regulatory T cell differentiation, positive regulation of T cell apoptotic process and PDL-1.

entity.text: negative regulation of regulatory T cell differentiation
positive regulation of T cell apoptotic process

sentence.text: Immune checkpoint blockade (ICB) using anti-negative regulation of regulatory T cell differentiation and anti-positive regulation of T cell apoptotic process has drawn considerable attention towards co-signaling receptors in tumor immunology and created renewed interest in studying other co-signaling receptors, which until recently have not been as well studied.

entity.text: negative regulation of regulatory T cell differentiation
positive regulation of T cell apoptotic process
